title: Running with the Wolvo
description: The continuing autobiography of long term HAMC Wolvo member 'Big Frank' Thorley. The story tells of the authors inauguration into the Wolverhampton Chapter of the Hells Angels and his experiences as a member of a motorcycle club exiled to the fringes of society. The finale of the book is a denouement of its underlying mystery and tragedy.
author: Frank Thorley
